titleStmt.title: Reformed catholique, or, The true protestant
titleStmt.author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Sir Roger L'Estrange. Cf. Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: pages cropped and tightly bound with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: Trinity College (Dublin, Ireland). Library.
